item.title: 嗨咯
item.description: Hello World 2021 年 10 月 1 日，我的站点正式发布， 愿你被世界温柔以待。 1img { 2 transition: all var(--TmOne); 3 width: 50%; 4 border-radius: var(--Ri); 5} 6img:hover { 7 cursor: pointer; 8 box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06) 0px 1px 2px 0px; 9} 10 Today I shed my old skin which hath, too long, suffered the bruises of failure and the wounds of mediority. Today I am born anew and my birthplace is a vineyard where there is fruit for all.
